description: The Mammut Essential T-Shirt is a simple leisure t-shirt made from sustainably produced bioRe® 100% organic cotton. It comes in different versions for everyday urban life with a small embroidered feature on the chest. Choose from a mountain, carabiner, rope, binoculars or coffee cup to make your own discreet outdoor statement in everyday life. Coordinates with the Mammut ML Pull and the Mountain Cap.
name: Mammut Mammut Essential T-Shirt - Mens
